metadata.title: CVE-2022-1954 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Regular Expression Denial of Service vulnerability in GitLab CE/EEaffecting all versions from 1.0.2 prior to 14.10.5, 15.0 prior to 15.0.4,and 15.1 prior to 15.1.1 allows an attacker to make a GitLab instanceinaccessible via specially crafted web server response headers

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
